title: Yosemite USB Backup
description:
2 Simple Steps:
1- Restore the image using EaseUS Todo Backup(already included in the torrent.)

2- Boot via your usb, then press enter. Wait until the installation interface pops up. The rest is kids' stuff.
Good Luck!

In case these 2 commands are needed:

1st command: cp -R /Volumes/USB_NAME/System/Library/Extensions/FakeSMC.kext /Volumes/YOUR_DISK_NAME/System/Library/Extensions/

2nd command: cp -R /Volumes/USB_NAME/System/Library/Extensions/NullCPUPowerManagement.kext /Volumes/YOUR_DISK_NAME/System/Library/Extensions/

NOTE: REPLACE "YOUR_DISK_NAME" & "USB_NAME with the name you chose for your disk & USB.
e.g: If the disk's name is Mac and the usb's name is Yosemite, then: cp -R /Volumes/Yosemite/System/Library/Extensions/FakeSMC.kext /Volumes/Mac/System/Library/Extensions/
